page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content:
The staff and children of{Bramley {Sunnyside Junior School,}and those of {Flanderwell J + I School}wish to thank the community of Bramley, Sunnyside and surrounding District for their willing help in compiling this picture of life in our area, in our time.
{ Major contributors: 3rd and 4th year pupils of Bramley Sunnyside Junior school: 3rd year pupils of Flanderwell J+I School_1985
Staff_{Mark Armstrong, David Boulding, Sue Davies, Kathleen Eccles, Paddy Graham, Carol Makin, Susan Pontefract and David Smart
16th., JULY, 1985.
